subject: Attention:Unpaid beneficiary
body:
Attention:Unpaid beneficiary.
On behalf of the Department Of Treasury Direct-Account Washington DC,
and United Nations Award Payment,we wish to notify you as
a beneficiary of $2,7 million dollars in compensation of scam
victims.
You are the next person to be paid for the (Scam victims). Am
here to inform you that we have verified your compensation file
presently on my desk,and I found out that you have not received your
payment due to your lack of co-operation and not fulfilling the
obligations giving to you in respect to your compensation payment.
Secondly, you are hereby advised to stop dealing with some
non-officials in the bank or any offices as this is an illegal act and
you have to stop if you so wish to receive your payment immediately.
After the board meeting held at our headquarters, we have resolved in
finding a solution to your problem,and we would like to inform you
that we have arranged your compensation funds $2,7 million to be paid
you bank to bank wire transfer which is the instruction given by
Department Of Treasury Direct-Account Washington DC and United Nations
Cash Grant Award Payment to you. You are required to contact the
paying bank with the below information's for your compensation funds.
BANK NAME:LEGENCE BANK PLC
ADDRESS:502 N,COMMERCIAL ST,HARRISBURG,IL,62946,USA
CONTACT PERSON:MR,COLIN POOLE
EMAIL:(
officmailecolinpoole2009@gmail.com
)
Best Regards,
Ms.Caroline Owen
Department Of Treasury Direct-Account Washington DC

subject: Re:   Attention:Unpaid beneficiary
body:
Hello Owen, thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment for scam victims. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please share more details about the process of receiving the funds through bank to bank wire transfer? How can I ensure that this transaction is secure and legitimate?

Best wishes,
Dominica

subject: Re: Attention:Unpaid beneficiary
body:
Attention:Dominica


I received your email now,about your compensation payment of $2,7
million,information needed from you now is below:

1)Your bank Name:
2)Bank Address:
3)Account No:
6)Swfit Code:
4)Account Name:
5)Copy of Your ID Card:
6)Your next of Kin:
7)Your Phone No:

Find Attached Copy of my working ID card and get back to me.
Thanks,

Mr.Colin Poole

subject: Re: Attention:Unpaid beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to provide the information you requested. Could you please clarify what this payment is for and how it is related to your working ID card?

Best wishes,
Dominica
